value.title: Dow falls 400 points after Trump calls off negotiations on stimulus package
value.excerpt: Wall Street fell on Tuesday after President Donald Trump said he had would be halting all negotiations on a new round of coronavirus stimulus relief. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell by almost 400 points,

value.title: Trump Says He Told Aides To Stop Negotiating Stimulus Until After Election
value.excerpt: The president blasted Speaker Nancy Pelosi's plan as too expensive and said Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell should focus on the Supreme Court.

value.title: Coming full circle, Trump returns to false, misguided 'flu' rhetoric
value.excerpt: Nearly seven months after his misguided "think about that!" tweet, comparing COVID-19 to the flue, the Republican has apparently come full circle.

value.title: Trump still believes the cure for the virus is ‘positive thinking’
value.excerpt: Peale’s work drew on, and popularized for a new generation, the hugely influential 19th century spiritual movement of New Thought, first popularized by onetime watchmaker Phineas Quimby in the 1860s.

value.title: Trump spokesman lies about the president being alone for maskless balcony stunt while videos roll showing the contrary
value.excerpt: President Donald Trump’s deputy press secretary lied on Fox News again while videos were showing the truth. According to Hogan Gidley, the president is social distancing and following all of the CDC guidelines and the Coronavirus Task Force.

value.title: Eric Trump answers questions from NY investigators in examination of family business
value.excerpt: President Donald Trump's son Eric answered questions Monday from New York state investigators looking into his family's business practices. The office of New York Attorney General Letitia James confirmed that the video deposition took place as scheduled,

value.title: Donald Trump Jr. reportedly wanted a family 'intervention' to stop Trump's 'crazy behaviour' at Walter Reed
value.excerpt: Donald Trump's erratic and controversial behaviour since his hospitalisation for Covid-19 has divided his family, according to a report.

value.title: Trump said in March that he didn't have 'a lot of time' to meet Fauci as the coronavirus spread across the US, according to a new recording
value.excerpt: Trump made the comment during a March 19 interview with the journalist Bob Woodward. CNN published a segment of interview audio on Monday.

value.title: 'An embarrassment': Trump tweet angers pandemic survivors
value.excerpt: Some survivors of COVID-19 and people who have lost loved ones to the pandemic are angry over President Donald Trump's advice not to fear the disease

value.title: Trump accuser E. Jean Carroll files motion against Justice Department
value.excerpt: Former Elle columnist E. Jean Carroll is fighting the Justice Department’s attempt to substitute for President Donald Trump as the defendant in her defamation lawsuit.

value.title: Trump's niece, Mary, says the COVID-19 situation in the US is 'horrible' because the president sees illness as 'a display of unforgivable weakness'
value.excerpt: Mary Trump, an outspoken critic of Donald Trump, her uncle, spoke with NPR's "All Things Considered" after the president's COVID-19 diagnosis.

value.title: WSJ Opinion: The Trump Ticket Needs a Dose of Mike Pence
value.excerpt: Main Street: Wednesday night's prime-time face-off between Mike Pence and Kamala Harris could be the most consequential vice-presidential debate ever. Images: A

value.title: Progressive groups launch 'We Paid More' campaign in response to Trump taxes report
value.excerpt: A coalition of progressive groups on Monday launched an initiative to make the case that the tax code is too favorable to the wealthy, after The New York Times reported last week that President Trump

value.title: Trump Campaign Says Biden Lacks 'Firsthand Experience' of Being Infected With COVID-19
value.excerpt: "Those firsthand experiences are what are going to get President Trump four more years," Trump campaign spokesperson Erin Perrine told Fox News on Monday.

value.title: Secret Service ‘Volunteered’ For Trump Drive, Lewandowski Claims
value.excerpt: An attending physician said the agents likely didn’t know the “real risks” of being inside the vehicle with Trump.

value.title: Trump pledges to pass 'THE BIGGEST TAX CUT EVER' in early morning campaign tweetstorm from Walter Reed
value.excerpt: Trump previously vowed a middle-class tax cut during the November 2018 midterms, but it never happened. His second-term tax platform remains vague.

value.title: CNN supercut shows how Trump has repeatedly mocked his opponents’ health
value.excerpt: CNN’s John Avlon on Monday showed how President Donald Trump has repeatedly used his political opponents’ health as a weapon, such as when he openly mocked Hillary Clinton for coming down with pneumonia in 2016.

value.title: Meadows: ‘Still optimistic’ Trump will leave hospital later on Monday
value.excerpt: Trump's chief of staff said the president will meet with his doctors and nurses on Monday morning to assess his progress.

value.title: Trump's latest political theatrics described as 'insanity'
value.excerpt: Even in the midst of a national crisis, the nation's reality-show president was preoccupied with putting on a little show for the cameras.

value.title: Russians ‘Have Committed’ to Not Interfering in Elections, Trump Aide Insists
value.excerpt: Robert C. O’Brien, the national security adviser, said he warned his Russian counterpart there would be “no tolerance” for interference, but didn’t mention evidence of Moscow’s influence operations.

value.title: Trump, who has a highly contagious infectious disease, left Walter Reed to pay a 'surprise visit' to cheering 'fans' outside the hospital
value.excerpt: He was moved to the hospital on Friday for a "few days."

value.title: Trump's infection shows officials must take virus seriously - Germany's Altmaier
value.excerpt: German Economy Minister Peter Altmaier said on Sunday that U.S. President Donald Trump's coronavirus infection showed that politicians must take the COVID-19 pandemic more seriously and stop minimizing its health risks.

value.title: With Trump hospitalized, VP Mike Pence will visit Arizona for a Thursday rally, campaign says
value.excerpt: Pence will host a rally at a tactical-gear supply business in Peoria. His visit had been expected for weeks, but COVID-19 has since rocked the campaign.

value.title: Trump and the GOP are using Kyle Rittenhouse in last-ditch 2020 voter strategy
value.excerpt: With weeks to go before a chaotic and close election, Republicans are cultivating a vigilante identity — someone who breaks the rules to make things right.

value.title: 'The Squad' Responds to Twitter Policy Banning Posts Wishing for Trump's Death: 'Excuse Me?'
value.excerpt: "So... you mean to tell us you could've done this the whole time?" Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez tweeted.

value.title: In First Video From Hospital, Trump Says He Feels ‘Much Better,’ But Next Few Days Will Be ‘The Real Test’
value.excerpt: President Donald Trump Saturday night said in a video from Walter Reed Medical Center he is feeling “much better now” after White House officials gave conflicting accounts about his condition throughout the day.

value.title: Minnesota congressmen flew Delta after flying with Trump
value.excerpt: Three Minnesota congressmen are facing backlash over taking a commercial flight home from Washington, D.C., on Friday night just two days after they shared Air Force One with President Donald Trump. U.

value.title: Was Trump ever on oxygen? Health, security experts say America needs 'total honesty' on president's condition
value.excerpt: Dr. Sean Conley created confusion about President Trump's COVID-19 diagnosis, which national security and health experts say is unnecessary.

value.title: Doctors say giving Trump the antiviral drug remdesivir is a sign his infection may be serious — even though the timeline is still unclear
value.excerpt: Trump received an IV infusion of the antiviral drug remdesivir on Friday. The therapy is typically reserved for severe cases.

value.title: Trump has been 'fever-free' for over 24 hours, hasn't need supplemental oxygen at hospital
value.excerpt: President Donald Trump has been fever-free for over 24 hours and has not needed supplemental oxygen Saturday morning, his doctors told reporters outside Walter Reed National Military Medical Center.
